pages.text:
The Glades is open!
If you are searching for peace and tranquility, the Glades is the park for you.
Away from the traffic, hustle, and crowds along the coasts, the Glades Resort is a mecca of spacious, waterfront, and private sites surrounded by an array of natural fauna and flora. You could be the only boat on the Caloossahatchee River or paddle along our private, in-park kayak water trail, go fishing, photograph a plethora of large birds, or just take a quiet walk through the area. If you are interested in more
activity
, we have a wide array to meet any interest, and you will meet the nicest people along the way. Our new shuttle service can take you to the Everglades Seminole Indian Resevation, the gulf beach, the Shell Factory, Gatorama, or shopping in LaBelle or any number of popular malls. We shuttle groups wherever they want to go!
We’re Proud Members of

Cancellation and Refund Policy
RV SITES
Our current daily and weekly fees will apply to all cancelled reservations.
Monthly $250 fee applies to all cancelled reservations.
No refunds if cancelled within 2 weeks prior to arrival.
CABIN RENTALS
Daily and weekly $125.00 applies to all cancelled reservations.
No refunds if cancelled within 2 weeks prior to arrival.
FOR ALL RENTALS ONE MONTH+
For rental terms of one month or more $250.00 cancellation fee applies. No refunds if cancelled within 2 weeks prior to arrival. All rentals, one month or longer will pay for electric.
No refunds for early departures.
Discounts on RV Sites
AAA
10% off full rate for one day only. (Not valid Jan, Feb, and March)
PASSPORT AMERICA
50% off full rate for one day only. (Not valid Jan, Feb, and March)
MILITARY
20% off full rate for maximum 7 days. (Not valid Jan, Feb, and March)
Reservation Policy
Reservations prior to arrival are highly recommended. A site is guaranteed for the length of your paid reservation with a prepayment. Site selection is based on availability and cannot be guaranteed. Site assignments will be determined by the office prior to check in.
Our listed pricing is applicable to two people only. Any additional overnight guests will be accessed a $3 per person per day charge. Maximum of 5 people allowed per site. Cabins and park homes rentals allow a maximum of two pets per unit and require a a $20 non-refundable pet usage fee per pet. Any damages will be charged to your credit card or account.
Prepayment of
Full payment is required at time of booking a reservation for rentals of 1 Month or less.
For seasonal reservations 2 months or longer a $500 deposit is required when booking a reservation - with the full balance due 30 days prior to arrival.
For annual reservations please call our office at 863-902-7034 for details.
The Glades offers a $200 discount to annual residents who wish to prepay their entire stay with a check or cash.
Prepaid Rent
Due at the time of Booking
Daily 100%
Weekly 100%
One Month 100%
2-6 Months $500.00 deposit with balance due 30 days prior to arrival.
Pet Fees
CABINS AND PARK MODELS
A maximum of two pets are permitted per accommodation.
Daily and weekly fees are $20.00 per day per pet, non refundable.
For stays one month or longer, fees are $100.00 per month per pet, non refundable.
We will hold your credit card information on file and if any damage occurs, there will be additional charges.

We’re Proud Members of

Golf Events
We always have something for everyone here at The Glades. There are always open tee times so you can schedule when you want to play any day of the week.
Starting on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday at 8:00 am we have an 18 hole Scramble. It is a great way to meet new people. On Thursday mornings our ladies enjoy their day with a fun scramble.
On Saturday mornings at 8:00 am we have a Skins game. You can test your skills and make new friends at the same time.
On Sundays we have a Fun Day. This is our most popular get together. Couples are chosen into 4 person teams and play a scramble format that sometimes has a little twist. It’s a fun time for all.
Tournaments
We have several tournaments throughout the Season. We start out with our Military Appreciation Tournament open to all current and retired service men and women and their spouses that reside here at the Glades. We also have our Club Championship which is open to both men and women based on a handicap system. It is a 36 hole tournament with both gross and net divisions. There are four formats, scramble, alternate shot, better ball, and individual matches. Be sure and turn in your scores to be eligible to play in all our tournaments. We also have a tournament called Superintendent's Revenge. This is where our Superintendent sets up the golf course any way he wants to with a lot of crazy twists and pin placements. It is lots of fun playing an untraditional course setup.
We are always looking for new ideas and suggestions for new outings, tournaments, and anything else our players have in mind. You’re welcome to submit your suggestions to
eric@thegladesresort.com
.
* We offer a free handicap service to all players.
2 Person Mixed 18 Hole Scramble
Saturday 11:30 Shotgun
1 person on each team. Green fee, cash, credit or pass. Cash Prize Fund $3.00
Glades Championship Stroke Play
Saturday and Sunday. Tee Times starting at 8:00 am. Will use same tee time each day.
3 Divisions: Mens, Women, and Super Senoirs (70 and older)
Greens fee, cash, credit, pass and $20.00 prize fund.
Prizes Net and Gross per division.
9 Hole 2 Person Flog Scramble
Thursday Registration at 2:30pm. Shotgun at 3:00pm
Greens fee, cash, credit, pass. Cash prize fund $3.00
Please sign up in advance with both partners names.
Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary Program for Golf
Here at the Glades RV Resort we have joined with Audubon International to become an Audubon Certified facility. We are committed to preserve and enhance our environment through programs Audubon has proscribed as essential through stewardship and maintenance practices. The fact sheet will summarize exactly what the Golf Program is about and what The Glades RV Resort is striving to achieve. We have a beautiful facility and are proud of the flora and fauna that thrive here at The Glades. For more information about the ACSP for Golf or how you can get involved please contact the office or visit Audubon's website.
